enabled.name: Enable MCP Bridge
enabled.hint: Enable or disable the MCP bridge connection to external server

serverHost.name: MCP Server Host
serverHost.hint: Hostname or IP address of the external MCP server (default: localhost)

serverPort.name: MCP Server Port
serverPort.hint: Port number for the MCP server connection (default: 30000)

namespace.name: Socket Namespace
namespace.hint: Socket.io namespace path for MCP communication (default: /foundry-mcp)

connectionTimeout.name: Connection Timeout (seconds)
connectionTimeout.hint: Maximum time to wait for MCP server connection before timing out

reconnectAttempts.name: Reconnection Attempts
reconnectAttempts.hint: Number of times to attempt reconnection when connection is lost

reconnectDelay.name: Reconnection Delay (ms)
reconnectDelay.hint: Base delay between reconnection attempts (uses exponential backoff)

debugLogging.name: Debug Logging
debugLogging.hint: Enable detailed console logging for troubleshooting connection issues

notifications.connected: MCP Bridge connected successfully to external server
notifications.disconnected: MCP Bridge disconnected from external server
notifications.connectionFailed: Failed to connect MCP Bridge to external server
notifications.initializationFailed: Failed to initialize Foundry MCP Bridge SRA2 module
notifications.settingsReset: MCP Bridge settings have been reset to defaults
notifications.permissionDenied: Access denied - this feature is disabled in module settings

errors.notInitialized: MCP Bridge module is not properly initialized
errors.characterNotFound: Character not found in this world
errors.sceneNotFound: Scene not found or no active scene
